.layout[_ngcontent-ng-c1221725834] {
  display: flex;
  height: 100vh;
  background-color: #202940;
}
app-menu[_ngcontent-ng-c1221725834] {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  position: fixed;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
}
.estado-pendiente[_ngcontent-ng-c1221725834] {
  background-color: #ffc107;
  color: #212529;
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.estado-aceptado[_ngcontent-ng-c1221725834] {
  background-color: #28a745;
  color: white;
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.estado-rechazado[_ngcontent-ng-c1221725834] {
  background-color: #dc3545;

  .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .nav-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]:not(.submenu-toggle), 
   .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .user-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801] {
    padding: 0.75rem !important;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .nav-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]:not(.submenu-toggle)   i[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801], 
   .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .user-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   i[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801] {
    margin-right: 0;
    width: auto;
  }
  .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .nav-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]:not(.submenu-toggle)   span[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801], 
   .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .nav-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]:not(.submenu-toggle)   .user-info[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801], 
   .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .user-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   span[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801], 
   .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .user-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .user-info[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801] {
    display: none;
  }
  .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .submenu[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801] {
    padding-left: 0;
    gap: 0;
  }
  .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .submenu[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .nav-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801] {
    padding: 0.75rem !important;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center;
  }
  .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .submenu[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .nav-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   i[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801] {
    margin-right: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: auto;
  }
  .sidebar[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .submenu[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   .nav-link[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801]   span[_ngcontent-ng-c1173284801] {
